word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指经过思考、比较、讨论或询问之后做出的决定。
语气较强，强调以坚定不移的信念去做或不做某事，暗含有远大抱负和坚强决心。
指经过深思熟虑，决心去做某事并坚持施行。
指排除犹豫、怀疑和争论之后作出明确的最终结论。

bilingual.target: 看看这些图片然后决定。

bilingual.source: It's hard to decide what to do first.

list.abstract: decide（英 [dɪˈsaɪd]，美 [dɪˈsaɪd]），英语单词，作动词为决定；拿定主意；决心。短语搭配有decide to do（决定做）。例句为“Decide if the time is right.（决定时机是否合适。）” decide相关近义词有settle、condition等。

yingyinNormal.en: Then how do we decide?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那要怎么决定呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Show me, then I'll decide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等看完了再做决定。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll decide where it goes from here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在起由我决定该去哪里。

yingyinNormal.en: Cary, we don't decide until we vote.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯里，我们投票之后才能决定。

yingyinNormal.en: This is something only you can decide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有些事只有你自己才能决定。

yingyinNormal.en: But you decide to try a cup of coffee anyway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你还是决定要买杯咖啡。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry, you can decide tomorrow. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心，你可以明天再做决定。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: How long until your employers decide to kill you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你上司什么时候决定把你除掉？

yingyinNormal.en: I'll let you know what I decide. Thank you, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我决定了再告诉你，谢谢，总统先生。

yingyinNormal.en: And so, you decide to go with your first impression.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，你还是决定相信第一印象。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't decide what to throw out. I know. We'll let Peppa and George decide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们无法决定要把什么东西扔掉。我知道！我们让佩奇和乔治来决定。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh dear, we can't decide what to throw out. I know. We'll let Peppa and George decide. Ok.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢天啊，我们无法决定要把什么东西扔掉。我知道！我们让佩奇和乔治来决定。好的！

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have to decide now. If you look at our file.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不必马上决定，请看看我们的档案。

yingyinNormal.en: When did you guys decide there are no rules in here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们是什么时候决定这里可以没有规矩的？

yingyinNormal.en: So whose side are you on? I wish I didn't have to decide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你站哪边？真希望我不用做决定。

yingyinNormal.en: God, this is so hard. I can't decide between lamb or duck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这太难了，我没有办法决定，做羊还是鸭肉。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Let's figure out a fair way to decide who's staying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，那我们想一个较公平的方法来决定谁要留下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, right, sure. So, after I decide, do I then submit it to you for approval, or...? No. You decide, you approve, and then you pride yourself on a job well done. That's a lot of responsibility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 懂了，没问题。在我做了决定之后，我是把决定送交您审核通过，还是...？不用。你决定，你通过，然后你嘉勉自己做得棒棒哒。这责任十分重大啊。

yingyinNormal.en: It looks interesting. It looks different. You decide to walk in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它看起很吸引人，很有特色，你决定进去看看。

yingyinNormal.en: Good. Now, let's go decide what we're gonna do about these terrorists.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，我们去决定要怎么对付恐怖分子吧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 裁决; 判决; 解决

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 结论；决定；解决；决断；果断
adj. 确定的；毫无疑问的；坚定的；坚决的；观点鲜明的；判决了的
n. 果断；果断性
adj. 决定性的；决断的；果断的

word_family.mean: v. 决定；拿定主意；决心；裁决；判决；选定；对…作出决定；解决

sense_info_list.en: choose something, especially after thinking carefully about several possibilities

examination_example.sentence: The wonderful thing about failure is that it's entirely up to us to <highlight>decide</highlight> how to look at it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失败的妙处就在于，完全由我们来决定如何看待它。

examination_example.sentence: So I <highlight>decided</highlight> to look for some fashion-related courses that included writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我决定寻找一些时尚相关的课程，包括写作。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Decide</highlight> if the time is right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 决定时机是否合适。

sense_info_list.en: infer on the basis of evidence

examination_example.sentence: You may <highlight>decide</highlight> it's best to hold off on voicing your opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以断定不发表你的意见是最好的。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>decided</highlight> that it was not the right path for me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我断定这条路不适合我。

examination_example.sentence: France has <highlight>decided</highlight> its fashion industry has lost an absolute right to define physical beauty for women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国断定其时尚产业失去了为女性定义身体美的绝对权利。

sense_info_list.zh: 裁决; 判决; 解决

examination_example.sentence: Immigration issues are usually <highlight>decided</highlight> by Congress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 移民问题通常由国会判决。

sense_info_list.en: be the reason or situation that makes a particular result happen

examination_example.sentence: Its fate is yet to be <highlight>decided</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的命运尚未决定。

word_usage.usage:
表示“决定做某事”，用decide to do sth. 不能接动名词，若要接动名词，应先接介词 on，decide on doing sth.，示例：
We decided on leaving. 
我们决定离开。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: choose something, especially after thinking carefully about several possibilities

examination_example.sentence: This suggests that they were <highlight>deciding</highlight> between truth and dishonesty -- and ultimately opting for the latter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明他们在真理和不诚实之间做出了决定——并且最终选择了后者。

examination_example.sentence: We are not the ones to <highlight>decide</highlight> on establishment of marine protected areas, but we hope to contribute positively with our knowledge and experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不是决定建立海洋保护区的人，但是我们希望以我们的知识和经验做出积极的贡献。

examination_example.sentence: It will <highlight>decide</highlight> on the Weddell Sea sanctuary proposal at a conference in Australia in October.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将在10月于澳大利亚举行的一次会议上决定韦德尔海 (Weddell Sea) 保护区的提议。

examination_example.sentence: A survey shows shoppers today are getting more concerned about energy conservation and environmental protection when <highlight>deciding</highlight> what to buy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 调查显示，现在的消费者在消费时更多关注的是能源节约和环境保护。

examination_example.sentence: It's important to note that robotic nurses don't <highlight>decide</highlight> courses of treatment or make diagnoses (though robot doctors and surgeons may not be far off).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要注意的是，机器人护士并不能决定治疗方案或做出诊断（虽然机器人医生和外科医生可能离我们不远了）。

examination_example.sentence: It is clearly up to the current generation of leaders from high-emitting nations to <highlight>decide</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显然，这还是要由高排放国家的当代领导人来决定。

sense_info_list.en: infer on the basis of evidence
be the reason or situation that makes a particular result happen

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重指经过思考、比较、讨论或询问之后做出的决定。
既可指重大的或一般的决定或决心, 又可指在多种情况下作出果断的抉择, 毫不犹豫地采取行动。
侧重坚定不移的顽强意志力。
指经过深思熟虑, 决心去做某事并坚持施行。

examination_example.sentence: I've heard that German cars are very reliable, but I haven't <highlight>decided</highlight> on a specific model yet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我听说德系车很可靠，但我还没有决定具体的型号。

examination_example.sentence: To be honest, I could use some help in <highlight>deciding</highlight> what type of vehicle would best suit my needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坦白说，我需要一些帮助来决定什么类型的车辆最适合我的需求。

examination_example.sentence: This connection happens not only by means of collaborative development, review and testing, but also at conferences where faculty regularly <highlight>decide</highlight> on their textbooks and curricula for the coming year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种联系不仅仅是通过协作开发、审查和测试得以实现，更是在教职人员通常召开的决定来年使用何种教材、开设何种课程的会议上体现出来。

word_usage.usage: decide不可以直接跟动名词doing，但decide on可以接doing。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重指经过思考、比较、讨论或询问之后做出的决定。
既可指重大的或一般的决定或决心，又可指在多种情况下作出果断的抉择，毫不犹豫地采取行动。
侧重坚定不移的顽强意志力。
指经过深思熟虑，决心去做某事并坚持施行。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 决定性的
n. 结论；决定；解决；决断；果断
adj. 未作决定的；犹豫不决的；未决的；未定的
adv. 果断地；决然地

word_family.mean: v. 决定；拿定主意；决心；裁决；判决；选定；对…作出决定；解决

sense_info_list.en: choose something, especially after thinking carefully about several possibilities

examination_example.sentence: When I was eighteen, I <highlight>decided</highlight> that I really preferred contemporary dance and that I wanted to do it professionally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我18岁的时候，我确定我真的更喜欢现代舞，并且我想要成为一名专业舞者。

examination_example.sentence: That was the name students voted for after <highlight>deciding</highlight> that "Room 104""was too dull.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是当初他们觉得“104室”这个名字乏味透顶后同学们投票选出的名字。

examination_example.sentence: After that, feeling the need to explore further, I <highlight>decided</highlight> to drop in on one of ASL club's meetings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那之后，我觉得有必要进一步探索，于是决定去参加一个美国手语俱乐部的会议。

examination_example.sentence: What does Jenny <highlight>decide</highlight> to do first?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍妮决定先做什么？

sense_info_list.en: infer on the basis of evidence

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>decided</highlight> it was not fair that I had to contribute my money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我断定让我出钱不公平的。

examination_example.sentence: That was the name students voted for after <highlight>deciding</highlight> that "Room 104" was too dull.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在断定“104室”太过沉闷后，这是学生们投票决定的名字。

examination_example.sentence: The tasters move down the line with surprising speed, tasting from a spoon and <highlight>deciding</highlight> what is a fair price for each tea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 品茶师以惊人的速度依次品尝，用勺子品茶，然后决定每一杯茶的合理价格。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 决定性的
n. 结论；决定；解决；决断；果断
adj. 确定的；毫无疑问的；坚定的；坚决的；观点鲜明的；判决了的

word_family.mean: v. 决定；拿定主意；决心；裁决；判决；选定；对…作出决定；解决

sense_info_list.en: choose something, especially after thinking carefully about several possibilities

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>decided</highlight> to continue my work, so that I could learn a lot from this work experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我决定继续我的工作，这样我可以从这次工作经历中学到很多。

examination_example.sentence: As a university student, I <highlight>decided</highlight> to learn German.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名大学生，我决定学习德语。

examination_example.sentence: We haven't <highlight>decided</highlight> when to visit our grandparents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还没有决定什么时候去看望我们的祖父母。

sense_info_list.en: infer on the basis of evidence

examination_example.sentence: This step requires you to <highlight>decide</highlight> whether a word is important enough for you to learn now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一步需要你判定一个单词对你现在的学习是否足够重要。

examination_example.sentence: It then sends a picture to a certain center which can <highlight>decide</highlight> who the person is.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后它会发送一张图片到某个中心，这个中心可以判定这个人是谁。

examination_example.sentence: These characteristics might help you to <highlight>decide</highlight> what is and what is not a robot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些特征可能会帮助你判断什么是机器人，什么不是。

sense_info_list.en: be the reason or situation that makes a particular result happen

examination_example.sentence: The local temperature <highlight>decides</highlight> the sex（性别）of the baby crocodile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地的温度决定了小鳄鱼的性别。

examination_example.sentence: Each person has a body clock that helps to <highlight>decide</highlight> his or her sleep pattern．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都有生物钟，帮助决定他或她的睡眠模式。

examination_example.sentence: Your habits will <highlight>decide</highlight> whether or not you are successful in the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的习惯将决定你将来是否成功。
